title: GPT-OSS-120B (vLLM)
description: Serve OpenAI gpt‑oss‑120b model using vLLM on SaladCloud Secure nodes with multi-GPU support.

container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Required* Must be 2–63 characters long using lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start/end with a hyphen.

gpu_memory_util.title: GPU Memory Utilization
gpu_memory_util.description: Fraction of GPU VRAM vLLM may use (0.0–1.0). Lower this if you need more headroom.

networking_auth.title: Required* Container Gateway Authentication
networking_auth.description: When enabled, requests must include a SaladCloud API Key to access the container. When disabled, public (unauthenticated) access is allowed.
